text: Kostrzewa is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Andrzej Kostrzewa (born 1958), Polish fencer * Dorothy Kostrzewa (1928–2013), Canadian politician * Klara Sierońska-Kostrzewa (1913–1990), Polish gymnast * Maciej Kostrzewa (born 1991), Polish footballer * Ute Kostrzewa (born 1961), German volleyball player * Wera Kostrzewa, pseudonym of Maria Koszutska (1876–1939), Polish politician * Wojciech Kostrzewa (born 1960), Polish entrepreneur * Zdzisław Kostrzewa (1955–1991), Polish footballer ==See also== * Category:Polish-language surnames
title: Kostrzewa (surname)
